page.title: 10CLASS 6 SURVEY OF MUM'S JOBS
page.content: A survey of jobs done by mums showed that 10 did not have jobs outside the home.Of the 20 who did,15 worked full time i.e.3 burlers and menders,1 nurse,3 secretaries,2 hairdressers,1 checking prams,1 supermarket check-out operator,1 caring for the elderly,1 clerk,1 Telecom worker and 1 adult teacher.5 mothers worked part-time 4 as cleaners and one as a barmaid.All worked locally except 1 who travelled to{Leeds}and 1 to{Otley. BY RACHEL BUTLER AND JACKIE PETERS. {MY DAD IS A FIREMAN BY CARL HERBERT}He goes to about 3 fires a week and often it is a chip pan fire.The biggest fire he has been to needed 20 pumps.My dad drives the engine and switches on the siren.He sometimes uses oxygen and he has never been overcome by smoke.His station is a modern one at{Rawdon.
